data.name: Wake of Ragnarok
data.detailed_description:
A FANTASY ACTION RPG.

• Campaign

You play as vidar, son of odin. After ragnarok, the end of the world, you wake up in Helheim, realm of the dead. You wander the halls for hundred of years fighting your way back to the world of the living, only to find your people gone, and a new order has risen under one god.

• Action combat

Attack, block, dash, parry, positioning and learning enemy fight patterns are the only way to thrive

• Play your way

Freely combine weapons, armor, talents and spells. Develop Vidar according to your playstyle, a slow moving heavy armored tank, a quick moving, dual dagger setup, or perhaps a spell slinger? There are many choices.

• Bosses

The game features many unique bosses that require strategy and quick reflexes to defeat

• In-game Editor

Expand your adventures by creating new maps from scratch, or download other player made maps. Or perhaps share your own?

A FANTASY ACTION RPG.

• Campaign

You play as vidar, son of odin. After ragnarok, the end of the world, you wake up in Helheim, realm of the dead. You wander the halls for hundred of years fighting your way back to the world of the living, only to find your people gone, and a new order has risen under one god.

Freely combine weapons, armor, talents and spells. Develop Vidar according to your playstyle, a slow moving heavy armored tank, a quick moving, dual dagger setup, or perhaps a spell slinger? There are many choices.

data.short_description: An action-rpg where some survived Ragnarok, the end of the world. Explore, find new equipment, upgrade your skills and bring the fight to the hordes of enemies and bosses standing in your way of getting home to Asgard.
